title: rioters please answer this question
body: is their any reason why i cant buy rp i've logged and relogged in and it hasnt fixed it please respond asap ty

replies.body: We may be able to help out with this!  Reach out to us by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can assist with your specific issue.  We'll respond as soon as possible!
